Scherbatyuk","details":"This contract acts as a marketplace for DeCup NFTs, handling order creation, cancellation, and executionUses a simple price feed mechanism and charges a manager fee in USD converted to ETH","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addChainReceiver(uint256,address)":{"details":"Updates the receiver address in the mapping chainId => receiverAddress","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain to update","receiverAddress":"The new receiver address for the chain"}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"Returns the collateral balance of a user","params":{"user":"The address of the user"},"returns":{"_0":"The collateral balance of the user"}},"buy(uint256,address,bool)":{"details":"Buys a DeCup NFT from a sale orderThe buyer must send sufficient ETH to cover the price of the NFT","params":{"buyerBeneficiaryAddress":"The address that will receive the NFT","isBurn":"Whether to burn the NFT after transfer","saleId":"The ID of the sale to buy"}},"buyCrossSale(uint256,address,uint256,bool)":{"details":"Buyer must send sufficient ETH to cover:      1. The token price in ETH (converted from USD)      2. CCIP fees for cross-chain messageRecords the payment amount and initiates cross-chain transfer via CCIPEmits Buy event on successful payment and CrossChainSent on message dispatchThis function is called by the buyer from destination chain to purchase a DeCup NFT on source chain","params":{"buyerBeneficiaryAddress":"The address that will receive the NFT","destinationChainId":"The ID of the source chain where the NFT is located","isBurn":"Whether to burn the token after transfer","saleId":"The ID of the sale to purchase"}},"cancelCrossSale(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"The collateral amount is required to cover CCIP fees for cross-chain token transfersActual NFT token is minted on the same chain as the manager contract being interacted withRemoves the token from sale on both chains and sends a cross-chain message to cancel the sale","params":{"destinationChainId":"The ID of the chain where the sale exists","tokenId":"The ID of the token to remove from sale"}},"cancelSale(uint256)":{"details":"Removes the seller address mapping for the given sale IDOnly the seller or contract owner can cancel orders (access control should be added)","params":{"tokenId":"The ID of the token to cancel the sale for"}},"ccipReceive((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes,(address,uint256)[]))":{"details":"This function is called by the CCIP router and validates the sender","params":{"message":"The CCIP message containing the cross-chain data"}},"constructor":{"details":"Sets up the NFT contract reference, price feed, and cross-chain configurations","params":{"decupAddress":"The address of the DeCup NFT contract","destinationChainIds":"Array of destination chain IDs to support","destinationChainSelectors":"Array of CCIP chain selectors for each destination chain","linkTokens":"Array of LINK token addresses for each destination chain","priceFeedAddress":"The address of the Chainlink price feed contract","routerAddress":"Array of CCIP router addresses for each destination chain"}},"createCrossSale(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"The token must NOT be listed for sale on the target chain before creating an orderCreates a new sale order on target chain and stores it in the mapping saleId => saleOrder (tokenId, sellerAddress, buyerAddress, networkId)Increments the sale ID counter and emits a SaleCreated event (saleId, tokenId, sellerAddress)Lists the token for sale in the NFT contract after creating the order","params":{"beneficiaryAddress":"The address that will receive payment","destinationChainId":"The ID of the target chain where the sale will be created","tokenId":"The ID of the token to be sold"}},"createSale(uint256,address)":{"details":"The token must NOT be listed for sale in the NFT contract before creating an orderCreates a new sale order and stores it in the mapping saleId => saleOrder (tokenId, sellerAddress, buyerAddress, networkId)Increments the sale ID counter and emits a SaleCreated event (saleId, tokenId, sellerAddress)Lists the token for sale in the NFT contract after creating the order","params":{"beneficiaryAddress":"The address that will receive payment (defaults to token owner if zero address)","tokenId":"The ID of the token to be sold"}},"deleteChainReceiver(uint256)":{"details":"Deletes the receiver address from the mapping chainId => receiverAddress","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain to delete"}},"disableChain(uint256)":{"details":"Removes the chain details from the mapping chainId => chainSelector, linkAddress, receiverAddress, routerAddress","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain to disable"}},"enableChain(uint256,uint64,address,address,address)":{"details":"Adds the chain details to the mapping chainId => chainSelector, linkAddress, receiverAddress, routerAddress","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain to enable","chainSelector":"The ChainSelector of the chain","linkAddress":"The address of the LINK token on the chain","receiverAddress":"The address of the receiver contract on the chain","routerAddress":"The address of the router contract on the chain"}},"getCCIPRouter()":{"details":"Returns the CCIP router address","returns":{"_0":"The CCIP router address"}},"getCcipCollateralInEth()":{"details":"Returns the CCIP collateral in ETH","returns":{"_0":"The CCIP collateral in ETH"}},"getCcipCollateralInUsd()":{"details":"Returns the CCIP collateral in USD","returns":{"_0":"The CCIP collateral in USD"}},"getChainSelector(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the chain selector","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain"},"returns":{"_0":"The chain selector"}},"getDeCupAddress()":{"details":"Returns the address of the DeCup NFT contract","returns":{"_0":"The address of the DeCup NFT contract"}},"getEthUsdPrice()":{"details":"Gets the latest price data from the Chainlink price feed","returns":{"_0":"The ETH value equivalent to 1 USD (with 8 decimals)"}},"getLinkAddress(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the link address","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain"},"returns":{"_0":"The link address"}},"getPriceFeedAddress()":{"details":"Returns the price feed address","returns":{"_0":"The price feed address"}},"getPriceInETH(uint256)":{"details":"Converts USD price to ETH using price feed","params":{"priceInUSD":"The USD price to convert to ETH (with 8 decimals)"},"returns":{"_0":"The price in ETH (wei units)"}},"getPriceInETHIncludingCollateral(uint256)":{"details":"Converts USD price to ETH using price feed and adds CCIP collateral fee","params":{"priceInUSD":"The USD price to convert to ETH (with 8 decimals)"},"returns":{"_0":"The total price in ETH including collateral (wei units)"}},"getPriceInUsd(uint256)":{"details":"Converts ETH price to USD using the price feed","params":{"priceInETH":"The ETH amount to convert (in wei)"},"returns":{"_0":"The equivalent USD amount (with 8 decimals)"}},"getReceiverAddress(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the receiver address","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain"},"returns":{"_0":"The receiver address"}},"getRouter()":{"returns":{"_0":"CCIP router address"}},"getRouterAddress(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the router address","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain"},"returns":{"_0":"The router address"}},"getSaleCounter()":{"details":"Returns the sale counter","returns":{"_0":"The sale counter"}},"getSaleIdByTokenId(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves the sale ID from the mapping s_chainIdToTokenIdToSaleId","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain where the token is listed","tokenId":"The ID of the token to look up"},"returns":{"_0":"The sale ID associated with the token, or 0 if not listed"}},"getSaleOrder(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Returns the sale order","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain","saleId":"The ID of the sale"},"returns":{"_0":"The sale order"}},"getSaleOwner(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Returns the seller address for a given sale ID and chain ID","params":{"chainId":"The ID of the chain where the sale exists","saleId":"The ID of the sale"},"returns":{"_0":"The address of the seller"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setCcipCollateral(uint256)":{"details":"The collateral amount is required to cover CCIP fees for cross-chain token transfersThis amount is stored in USD with 8 decimals (not wei)","params":{"amount":"The collateral amount in USD (with 8 decimals)"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Should indicate whether the contract implements IAny2EVMMessageReceiver e.g. return interfaceId == type(IAny2EVMMessageReceiver).interfaceId || interfaceId == type(IERC165).interfaceId This allows CCIP to check if ccipReceive is available before calling it. If this returns false or reverts, only tokens are transferred to the receiver. If this returns true, tokens are transferred and ccipReceive is called atomically. Additionally, if the receiver address does not have code associated with it at the time of execution (EXTCODESIZE returns 0), only tokens will be transferred.","params":{"interfaceId":"The interfaceId to check"},"returns":{"_0":"true if the interfaceId is supported"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"transferOwnershipOfDeCup(address)":{"details":"Only callable by the current owner of this manager contract","params":{"newOwner":"The address of the new owner"}},"withdrawFunds()":{"details":"Only callable by the user who owns the collateralThe collateral is removed from the contract and the user's balance is updated"}},"title":"Decentralized Cup Manager (DeCupManager)","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"addChainReceiver(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Updates the receiver address for a chain"},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Returns the collateral balance of a user"},"buy(uint256,address,bool)":{"notice":"Buys a DeCup NFT on the same chain as the manager contract"},"buyCrossSale(uint256,address,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Executes a cross-chain buy order for a DeCup NFT"},"cancelCrossSale(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Cancels a cross-chain sale transfers"},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"notice":"IERC165 supports an interfaceId"},"transferOwnershipOfDeCup(address)":{"notice":"Transfers ownership of the DeCup NFT contract to a new owner"},"withdrawFunds()":{"notice":"Withdraws the collateral from the contract"}},"notice":"Manages the sale and purchase of DeCup NFTs with USD-denominated racts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x11a5a79827df29e915a12740caf62fe21ebe27c08c9ae3e09abe9ee3ba3866d3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3cf0c69ab827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"src/DeCupManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd28eae46258a675821a97f996720fc008c55b12a149a39cc4f08fdedadaa0ce1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fa0cd5cd1f8e7915c1257fb31d22bdae0e96b6187ab9bf277bfc05ca3b6adb8d","dweb:/ipfs/QmXHGbTxFxq5SEjMyYfgjKRUSGCCegXR4QjejwhKRi9wz3"]},"src/interfaces/IDeCup.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe5298e3f41bb521d42e3dd33e946f6ac86708ccb8df61d52ad7f42bfd97e6262","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e0bf2f38a95fab9d51ad6450353fbce0c939aa8744e34ffff330d88ead75d8fb","dweb:/ipfs/QmYuGkvxyq5fYkdz5xMWZoX6YieprVvXHq9hecA9b12ZHw"]}},"version":1}

addChainReceiver(uint256,address).details: Updates the receiver address in the mapping chainId => receiverAddress

params.chainId: The ID of the chain to update
params.receiverAddress: The new receiver address for the chain

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the collateral balance of a user

returns._0: The collateral balance of the user

buy(uint256,address,bool).details: Buys a DeCup NFT from a sale orderThe buyer must send sufficient ETH to cover the price of the NFT

params.buyerBeneficiaryAddress: The address that will receive the NFT
params.isBurn: Whether to burn the NFT after transfer
params.saleId: The ID of the sale to buy

buyCrossSale(uint256,address,uint256,boo.details: Buyer must send sufficient ETH to cover:      1. The token price in ETH (converted from USD)      2. CCIP fees for cross-chain messageRecords the payment amount and initiates cross-chain transfer via CCIPEmits Buy event on successful payment and CrossChainSent on message dispatchThis function is called by the buyer from destination chain to purchase a DeCup NFT on source chain

params.buyerBeneficiaryAddress: The address that will receive the NFT
params.destinationChainId: The ID of the source chain where the NFT is located
params.isBurn: Whether to burn the token after transfer
params.saleId: The ID of the sale to purchase

cancelCrossSale(uint256,uint256).details: The collateral amount is required to cover CCIP fees for cross-chain token transfersActual NFT token is minted on the same chain as the manager contract being interacted withRemoves the token from sale on both chains and sends a cross-chain message to cancel the sale

params.destinationChainId: The ID of the chain where the sale exists
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to remove from sale

cancelSale(uint256).details: Removes the seller address mapping for the given sale IDOnly the seller or contract owner can cancel orders (access control should be added)

params.tokenId: The ID of the token to cancel the sale for

ccipReceive((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes,.details: This function is called by the CCIP router and validates the sender

params.message: The CCIP message containing the cross-chain data

constructor.details: Sets up the NFT contract reference, price feed, and cross-chain configurations

params.decupAddress: The address of the DeCup NFT contract
params.destinationChainIds: Array of destination chain IDs to support
params.destinationChainSelectors: Array of CCIP chain selectors for each destination chain
params.linkTokens: Array of LINK token addresses for each destination chain
params.priceFeedAddress: The address of the Chainlink price feed contract
params.routerAddress: Array of CCIP router addresses for each destination chain

createCrossSale(uint256,address,uint256,.details: The token must NOT be listed for sale on the target chain before creating an orderCreates a new sale order on target chain and stores it in the mapping saleId => saleOrder (tokenId, sellerAddress, buyerAddress, networkId)Increments the sale ID counter and emits a SaleCreated event (saleId, tokenId, sellerAddress)Lists the token for sale in the NFT contract after creating the order

params.beneficiaryAddress: The address that will receive payment
params.destinationChainId: The ID of the target chain where the sale will be created
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to be sold

createSale(uint256,address).details: The token must NOT be listed for sale in the NFT contract before creating an orderCreates a new sale order and stores it in the mapping saleId => saleOrder (tokenId, sellerAddress, buyerAddress, networkId)Increments the sale ID counter and emits a SaleCreated event (saleId, tokenId, sellerAddress)Lists the token for sale in the NFT contract after creating the order

params.beneficiaryAddress: The address that will receive payment (defaults to token owner if zero address)
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to be sold

deleteChainReceiver(uint256).details: Deletes the receiver address from the mapping chainId => receiverAddress

params.chainId: The ID of the chain to delete

disableChain(uint256).details: Removes the chain details from the mapping chainId => chainSelector, linkAddress, receiverAddress, routerAddress

params.chainId: The ID of the chain to disable

enableChain(uint256,uint64,address,addre.details: Adds the chain details to the mapping chainId => chainSelector, linkAddress, receiverAddress, routerAddress

params.chainId: The ID of the chain to enable
params.linkAddress: The address of the LINK token on the chain
params.receiverAddress: The address of the receiver contract on the chain
params.routerAddress: The address of the router contract on the chain

getCcipCollateralInEth().details: Returns the CCIP collateral in ETH

getCcipCollateralInUsd().details: Returns the CCIP collateral in USD

getDeCupAddress().details: Returns the address of the DeCup NFT contract

returns._0: The address of the DeCup NFT contract

getEthUsdPrice().details: Gets the latest price data from the Chainlink price feed

returns._0: The ETH value equivalent to 1 USD (with 8 decimals)

getPriceInETH(uint256).details: Converts USD price to ETH using price feed

params.priceInUSD: The USD price to convert to ETH (with 8 decimals)

getPriceInETHIncludingCollateral(uint256.details: Converts USD price to ETH using price feed and adds CCIP collateral fee

params.priceInUSD: The USD price to convert to ETH (with 8 decimals)

returns._0: The total price in ETH including collateral (wei units)

getPriceInUsd(uint256).details: Converts ETH price to USD using the price feed

params.priceInETH: The ETH amount to convert (in wei)

getSaleIdByTokenId(uint256,uint256).details: Retrieves the sale ID from the mapping s_chainIdToTokenIdToSaleId

params.chainId: The ID of the chain where the token is listed
params.tokenId: The ID of the token to look up

returns._0: The sale ID associated with the token, or 0 if not listed

getSaleOwner(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the seller address for a given sale ID and chain ID

params.chainId: The ID of the chain where the sale exists

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCcipCollateral(uint256).details: The collateral amount is required to cover CCIP fees for cross-chain token transfersThis amount is stored in USD with 8 decimals (not wei)

params.amount: The collateral amount in USD (with 8 decimals)

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Should indicate whether the contract implements IAny2EVMMessageReceiver e.g. return interfaceId == type(IAny2EVMMessageReceiver).interfaceId || interfaceId == type(IERC165).interfaceId This allows CCIP to check if ccipReceive is available before calling it. If this returns false or reverts, only tokens are transferred to the receiver. If this returns true, tokens are transferred and ccipReceive is called atomically. Additionally, if the receiver address does not have code associated with it at the time of execution (EXTCODESIZE returns 0), only tokens will be transferred.

returns._0: true if the interfaceId is supported

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipOfDeCup(address).details: Only callable by the current owner of this manager contract

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner

withdrawFunds().details: Only callable by the user who owns the collateralThe collateral is removed from the contract and the user's balance is updated

addChainReceiver(uint256,address).notice: Updates the receiver address for a chain

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the collateral balance of a user

buy(uint256,address,bool).notice: Buys a DeCup NFT on the same chain as the manager contract

buyCrossSale(uint256,address,uint256,boo.notice: Executes a cross-chain buy order for a DeCup NFT

createCrossSale(uint256,address,uint256,.notice: Creates a new cross-chain sale order for a locally minted DeCup NFT

createSale(uint256,address).notice: Creates a new local sale order for a DeCup NFT

deleteChainReceiver(uint256).notice: Deletes the receiver address for a chain

disableChain(uint256).notice: Disables a chain for cross-chain interactions

enableChain(uint256,uint64,address,addre.notice: Enables a new chain for cross-chain interactions

getCcipCollateralInEth().notice: Returns the CCIP collateral in ETH

getCcipCollateralInUsd().notice: Returns the CCIP collateral in USD

getDeCupAddress().notice: Returns the address of the DeCup NFT contract

getEthUsdPrice().notice: Returns the current USD to ETH conversion rate

getPriceInETH(uint256).notice: Calculates the price in ETH for a given USD amount

getPriceInETHIncludingCollateral(uint256.notice: Calculates the total price in ETH for a given USD amount including CCIP collateral

getPriceInUsd(uint256).notice: Converts ETH amount to USD equivalent

getSaleIdByTokenId(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the sale ID for a given token on a specific chain

getSaleOwner(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the owner of a sale

setCcipCollateral(uint256).notice: Set the CCIP collateral amount required for cross-chain transfers

transferOwnershipOfDeCup(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the DeCup NFT contract to a new owner

withdrawFunds().notice: Withdraws the collateral from the contract
